Original meaning 本义: Meaning a cluster of flowers.

English senses 英语理解: cluster of flowers; earlobe

Usage example 用法举例: 花朵 huā duǒ (flower)

朶字的基本解释

朶
duǒ
同“朵”。

朶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duǒ］
［《廣韻》丁果切，上果，端。］
亦作“朶1”。亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
(1)树木枝叶花实下垂貌。后多指花朵。
(2)量词。花朵及花朵状物的计量单位。
(3)动。
(4)指用手捉。
(5)耳朵。转指两旁。参见“朵殿”、“朵樓”。
(6)姓。明有朵汝翼。

duǒ

Do
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duǒ］
["Guang Yun" Ding fruit cut, top fruit, end. ]
Also known as "Duo 1". Also called "1". Also known as "1".
(1) The branches and leaves of the trees are drooping. After referring to flowers.
(2) Quantifiers. The unit of measurement for flowers and flower objects.
(3) Move.
(4) Finger catch.
(5) Ears. Turn to the sides. See "Duodian", "Duolou".
(6) Last name. Ming has Duo Ruyi.
